KoPrivateGPT.utils.linker.redisdbSingleton module

class KoPrivateGPT.utils.linker.redisdbSingleton.RedisDBSingleton(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: object

RedisDBSingleton is a singleton class that manages redis. We use redis to link DB and passage ids that stores in retrievals.
